properties.title: Mettmen-Alp climbing park
properties.abstract: Alpine pastures, a babbling brook and firm rocks with maximum grip. The Widerstein is a climbers' paradise. Overnight stays possible in Naturfreundehaus Mettmen.
properties.description:
The Widerstein has one of the most beautiful locations of all of East Switzerlandâ€™s climbing parks. You can find climbs ranging from difficulty level 1 to 9 on boulders that are as tall as houses. The compact rock that offers maximum grip consists of quartz porphyry and has similar properties to granite. The climbing season extends from early summer to late autumn.

Around 150 drilled routes are available. Climbing nuts are not required. All routes can be climbed with 10 express set.
properties.name: Elm Ferienregion
